description: Hayden is a Pokémon Trainer from Fuchsia City that challenged Ash Ketchum to a Pokémon World Championships Normal Class battle in a park in Vermilion City just after Goh caught his Exeggcute. Before the battle, Hayden`s rank was 1,024. The battle was officially approved and was designated as a 1-on-1 battle. He was defeated by Pikachu but they agreed to battle again if they met again.
name: Hashiba
